pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Retinol 1% + Squalane Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Warnings

CAUTION: This serum contains high percentages of active ingredients. Patch test is essential. Apply a broad spectrum SPF while using the product and for a week thereafter. Do not use with other exfoliating treatments or retinoids. Can cause irritation, redness and peeling, especially around the eyes and mouth, in the early stages of treatment while skin builds tolerance. If persistent irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Do not use while pregnant. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool dry place. Refrigerate after opening. For further information please visit our website.

Directions

DIRECTIONS: Cleanse face. Apply a few drops of serum to face and neck in the evening. Wait for a minute for serum to absorb. For an intensive treatment apply a Skin Republic Face Mask over serum or follow with a moisturiser.
